question: Which space agency has announced the launch date for its manned mission to space station, aboard Falcon 9 rocket?
option3: Roscosmos State Corporation for Space Activities
explanation:
The National Aeronautics and Space Administration has recently announced that the two NASA astronauts will be sent to the space station on May 27, 
The mission is set to be carried out aboard the Falcon 9 rocket of SpaceX, the US-based private space company owned by Elon Musk. After ending its 30-year space shuttle program in 2011, NASA has been relying on the Russian space agency Rocosmos for launching its astronauts to space station.
